nodes.text: Baatar was a military rank within the Kaleesh military structure known as the Kolkpravis. A Baatar lead a brigade which consisted of one hundred to two hundred hordes each lead by a Tarkhan and made up of one hundred kamen each led by a Blackarm. Several Baatars answered to each of the eight Khans in the Izvoshra as part of their khanate.
